title: Benka is Slovakia's national treasure but also its most faked artist
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary: Peter and Anna talk about Martin Benka,  a Slovak painter, in this week's Spectacular Slovakia. Join them on their quest to learn more about his life, paintings, and why he is important to the country's history. They will also tell you where to go to see his artwork and why he loved Amsterdam.

description: Peter and Anna talk about Martin Benka,  a Slovak painter, in this week's Spectacular Slovakia. Join them on their quest to learn more about his life, paintings, and why he is important to the country's history. They will also tell you where to go to see his artwork and why he loved Amsterdam.
